name: ancrb

body.origin:
|- wb(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, wa(w1, w0)))
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, wa(w1, w0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, wa(w1, w0)))
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, wa(w1, w0)))

comment: Conjoin antecedent to right of consequent. (Contributed by NM, 25-Jul-1999.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 24-Mar-2013.)
